project.name: Tawja
project.description: Methodology & Toolbox to build modular modern applications

requireProperty.message: Environment variable TAWJA_HOME must be specified. ${tawja.message.doc.build}
Environment variable TAWJA_DEV_HOME must be specified. ${tawja.message.doc.build}

requireProperty.regexMessage: Project version ('${project.version}') must end in a number or -SNAPSHOT. ${tawja.message.doc.build}
